ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: After that He smoothed out the earth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And afterwards spread out the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and thereafter spread out the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: After this, He spread out the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And after it spread out the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And after that He spread the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the earth, He expanded it after that.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the earth-after that He spread it out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And after that He spread the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the earth which He spread out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the earth!- thereafter He stretched it out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereafter He spread out the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the earth, moreover, hath He extended (to a wide expanse);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And after that He spread the earth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And the earth He extended after that;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the earth after that He spread.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And after that He spread the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:30] and after that He spread out the earth: He made it flat, for it had been created before the heaven, but without having been spread out;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And after that He spread the earth) even then He spread it on the water; it is also said: 2,000 years after that He spread it on the water,
